announcements.headline: GRAVITY STUDIOS@ GMAC!
announcements.body: Opening Monday January 2nd! Sample classes at 9 AM & 6 PM, $5 each.  Find schedule on Facebook at Gravity Studios at GMAC or Tracy Waites Fitness.

announcements.headline: Try any regularly scheduled martial arts class for free!
